proposal: Diving into CityVerse, where 195 nations from 2019 come alive in a blockchain-powered metaverse, is like holding the world in your palm. 🌍 With 68 holders on the ETH network, you're shaping a unique digital realm. Why not amplify this experience? Our tools can help your community deploy their own DEX or run a blockchain lottery, turning every participant into a creator. Let's build together, making every corner of your metaverse even more dynamic.
